		Question: Which original member of Metallica did not play on Black Album?
		Answer:
answer:
The answer is: Cliff Burton.

The Black Album and Kill 'Em All are the first two albums that Metallica has released. Metallica was formed in 1981 by James Hetfield and Lars Ulrich. Cliff Burton was not a member of Metallica at the time of the recording of The Black Album.
